title: Scott Benton – 2022 Comments on Boris Johnson Returning as Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Scott Benton, the Conservative MP for Blackpool South, on Twitter on 22 October 2022.
content:
I have now formally nominated Boris Johnson for the leadership of the Conservative Party which, if successful, will lead to his being our next Prime Minister.
  *[NHSPRB]: NHS Pay Review Body
